overview: Released in digipak with a 16-page booklet glued on the left panel.  "Monkeys In Bercy 13" filmed and recorded live at Palais Omnisports De Paris Bercy, France, 5 January 2013.  "Extra Monkey TV" includes producing shaka sounds & videos, shaka backstage and live extracts on tour.
title: Shaka Ponk - Geeks On Stage
